jd: From: Himanshu Pandey, WISE EQUATION SOLUTION INC himanshu@wiseq.net Reply to: himanshu@wiseq.net Apple Role 3 - Position OpenPlease read all points carefully.Strong Candidates OnlyJava Backend EngineerLocation: Austin, TX (Day 1 onsite, local candidates preferred, relocation acceptable)Contract: Long-termDirect Client: AppleNo middle layer or implementation partners involved.Visa: H1B, H4 EAD, GC EAD, L1, L2, CPT, OPT (C2C is acceptable).For USC, GC, TN candidates, we work on Pinnacle W2 only.
